quest: Women over 21 were allowed to vote for the first time in 1969
quest_zh: 21歲以上的婦女被允許在1969年第一次投票

quest: James Watt was famous for his work on what?
quest_zh: 詹姆斯·瓦特（James Watt）以什麼作品而聞名？

quest: The Blitz is associated which event?
quest_zh: 閃電戰與哪個事件相關聯？

answers.answer: The UK and Germany bombing French cities
answers.answer_zh: 英國和德國轟炸法國城市

answers.answer: The UK evacuating troops from Dunkirk
answers.answer_zh: 英國從敦刻爾克撤離部隊

quest: Christmas Day celebrates the birth of Jesus Christ
quest_zh: 聖誕節慶祝耶穌基督的誕生

quest: Which TWO countries took part in the development of Concorde?
quest_zh: 哪兩個國家參與協和的發展？

quest: Who established the Church of England?
quest_zh: 誰建立了英格蘭教堂？

quest: Sir Edward Elgar is known for his famous music work – 'The Planets'
quest_zh: 愛德華·埃爾加爵士（Edward Elgar）以其著名的音樂作品 - “行星”而聞名

quest: Radar was developed by Scotsman Sir Robert Watson-Watt
quest_zh: 雷達由蘇格蘭人羅伯特·沃森·瓦特爵士開發

quest: EEC was set up in 1957 by six countries
quest_zh: EEC由六個國家於1957年成立

quest: Who had a great influence on the English language?
quest_zh: 誰對英語有很大的影響？

quest: Who of the following is associated with the Bonfire Night?
quest_zh: 以下誰與篝火之夜有關？

quest: Those who don't respect the law should not expect to be allowed to become permanent residents
quest_zh: 那些不尊重法律的人不應期望被允許成為永久居民

quest: How often do the PM's questions take place?
quest_zh: PM的問題多久發生一次？

quest: Which TWO of these are core values and responsibilities of the British society?
quest_zh: 其中哪兩個是英國社會的核心價值觀和責任？

answers.answer: To work to provide for yourself and your family
answers.answer_zh: 為自己和家人提供工作

answers.answer: Always share the same views as your partner
answers.answer_zh: 始終與您的伴侶分享相同的觀點

answers.answer: To vote in local and national government elections
answers.answer_zh: 在地方和國家政府選舉中投票

quest: £10 £20 £50 £100 are the only banknotes currently allowed in the UK
quest_zh: £10£20£50£100是英國目前唯一允許的鈔票

quest: Conditions in Ireland in the 19th century were much better than in the rest of the UK
quest_zh: 19世紀愛爾蘭的狀況比英國其他地區好得多

quest: How old do you have to be to stand for election as an MP?
quest_zh: 作為國會議員，您必須多大年齡？

quest: What is the Church of England also known as in Scotland and the US?
quest_zh: 在蘇格蘭和美國，英格蘭教會是什麼？

quest: Which patron Saint has a white cross on a blue ground?
quest_zh: 哪個守護神在藍色的地面上有一個白色的十字架？

quest: 'The Mousetrap','Jesus Christ Superstar' and 'Evita' are examples of British what?
quest_zh: 'The Mousetrap','Jesus Christ Superstar' and 'Evita' are examples of British what?

quest: In which TWO countries were PCCs elected in?
quest_zh: PCC選舉了哪兩個國家？

quest: Where were the MacDonalds of Glencoe originally from?
quest_zh: Glencoe的MacDonalds最初來自哪裡？

quest: Big Ben was named 'Elizabeth Tower' in honour of Queen Elizabeth I
quest_zh: 大笨鐘被命名為“伊麗莎白塔”，以紀念伊麗莎白女王

quest: When did newspapers begin to operate without a government licence?
quest_zh: 報紙何時開始沒有政府許可證？
